item.description:
A great, and often untapped resource for deal funding, lies in retirement funds, specifically 401ks and IRAs.

Join us on July 2nd for our monthly Turning the Key networking event and hear a special presentation by Mike Kobialka on how you can use your - and other people's - IRAs and 401ks to fund your deals.

It's easier than you might think, but there are a few gotchas you MUST be aware of.

Of note, Mike will be covering:
  • What self-directed IRA (SDIRA) accounts are and are not
  • How you or you clients can use an IRA or 401k to buy Foreclosures, Bank owned real estate at deep discounts, Real Estate Tax Liens and Discounted notes and mortgages
  • What a Solo(k) is, who can use them and why you might want one
  • When you can and can not "roll over" a retirement fund
  • The role of a "Custodian" and what happens when you don't have one


Seating is Limited and pre-registration is HIGHLY recommended!

$45 at the Door (no exceptions) • $15 for Pre-Registrations • $10 for Pre-Registered Members • FREE for TTK Pass Holders. Pre-Register Online <-- Here

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: TTK: Investing in Real Estate with a Self-Directed IRA
